identity.Description: The cmk identity for the server.

sku.Description: The SKU (pricing tier) of the server.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

name.Description: The name of the sku, e.g. Standard_D32s_v3.

tier.Description: The tier of the particular SKU, e.g. GeneralPurpose.

administratorLogin.Description: The administrator's login name of a server. Can only be specified when the server is being created (and is required for creation).

administratorLoginPassword.Description: The password of the administrator login (required for server creation).

availabilityZone.Description: availability Zone information of the server.

createMode.Description: The mode to create a new MySQL server.

restorePointInTime.Description: Restore point creation time (ISO8601 format), specifying the time to restore from.

replicaCapacity.Description: The maximum number of replicas that a primary server can have.

fullyQualifiedDomainName.Description: The fully qualified domain name of a server.

storage.Description: Storage related properties of a server.

backup.Description: Backup related properties of a server.

highAvailability.Description: High availability related properties of a server.

network.Description: Network related properties of a server.

privateEndpointConnections.Description: PrivateEndpointConnections related properties of a server.

importSourceProperties.Description: Source properties for import from storage.

geoBackupUserAssignedIdentityId.Description: Geo backup user identity resource id as identity can't cross region, need identity in same region as geo backup

geoBackupKeyURI.Description: Geo backup key uri as key vault can't cross region, need cmk in same region as geo backup

type.Description: The key type, AzureKeyVault for enable cmk, SystemManaged for disable cmk.

storageSizeGB.Description: Max storage size allowed for a server.

autoGrow.Description: Enable Storage Auto Grow or not.

logOnDisk.Description: Enable Log On Disk or not.

storageSku.Description: The sku name of the server storage.

autoIoScaling.Description: Enable IO Auto Scaling or not.

backupRetentionDays.Description: Backup retention days for the server.

geoRedundantBackup.Description: Whether or not geo redundant backup is enabled.

earliestRestoreDate.Description: Earliest restore point creation time (ISO8601 format)

mode.Description: High availability mode for a server.

state.Description: The state of server high availability.

standbyAvailabilityZone.Description: Availability zone of the standby server.

publicNetworkAccess.Description: Whether or not public network access is allowed for this server. Value is 'Disabled' when server has VNet integration.

delegatedSubnetResourceId.Description: Delegated subnet resource id used to setup vnet for a server.

id.Description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. E.g. "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}"

type.Description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

groupIds.Description: The group ids for the private endpoint resource.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.Description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state of the private endpoint connection resource.

id.Description: The ARM identifier for private endpoint.

status.Description: Indicates whether the connection has been Approved/Rejected/Removed by the owner of the service.

description.Description: The reason for approval/rejection of the connection.

actionsRequired.Description: A message indicating if changes on the service provider require any updates on the consumer.

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

customWindow.Description: indicates whether custom window is enabled or disabled

dayOfWeek.Description: day of week for maintenance window

storageUrl.Description: Uri of the import source storage.

sasToken.Description: Sas token for accessing source storage. Read and list permissions are required for sas token.

dataDirPath.Description: Relative path of data directory in storage.

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

creationTime.Description: Specifies the UTC creation time of the policy.

state.Description: Specifies the state of the Advanced Threat Protection, whether it is enabled or disabled or a state has not been applied yet on the specific database or server.

provisioningState.Description: Provisioning state of the Threat Protection.
